Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Slumming \Slum"ming\, vb. n. Visiting slums. Sometimes used humorously, in reference to the appearance of a dignified person in a situation generally thought of as low-class. [1913 Webster +PJC]
slum n : a district of a city marked by poverty and inferior living conditions [syn: {slum area}] v : visit slums for entertainment or out of curiosity [also: {slumming}, {slummed}]
